title: Train a Retailer on a New Product Line
description: A wholesaler is launching a new, complex product line. An agent needs to schedule and conduct a training session for a key retailer's sales staff.

tasks.description: Contact the retailer to schedule a product training session.
tasks.expected_outcome: A date and time for a virtual training session is agreed upon.

tasks.description: Prepare training materials, including a presentation and product demos.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a comprehensive training packet.

tasks.description: Conduct the training session for the retailer's staff.
